```{r}

ojs_define(person_id = params$person_id)
```

```{ojs}
//| echo: false

results = await fetch("https://api.andrewheiss.com/books?person=" + person_id)
  .then(response => {
    return response.json();
  })

table_settings = {
  return {
    sort: "actual_time",
    reverse: true,
    rows: 11.5,
    layout: "auto",
    columns: [
      "actual_time",
      "title",
      "author_name"
    ],
    header: {
      actual_time: "Date",
      title: "Title",
      author_name: "Author"
    },
    format: {
      actual_time: x => {
        let date = new Date(x);
        return date.toLocaleString('en-US', {
          weekday: "long",
          month: "long",
          day: "numeric",
          year: "numeric"
        });
      }
    }
  }
}
```

```{ojs}

viewof search_table = Inputs.search(results.data)
```

```{ojs}
//| echo: false

Inputs.table(search_table, table_settings)
```
